00001 #include "TAPGeneratorFactory.h"
00002 #include "MaxBinAPGenerator.h"
00003 #include "TPulseIsland.h"
00004 #include "TAnalysedPulse.h"
00005 #include "EventNavigator.h"
00006 #include "SetupNavigator.h"
00007 #include <algorithm>
00008 
00009 // IsTimeOrdered()
00010 // -- Returns true of the first pulse is before the second
00011 // Static so that only this file sees it
00012 // Useful for sorting the pulses
00013 static bool IsTimeOrdered(TAnalysedPulse* a, TAnalysedPulse* b) {
00014   // Want a to be before b
00015   return ( a->GetTime() < b->GetTime() );
00016 }
00017

00019 
00020 
00021 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 int MaxBinAPGenerator::ProcessPulses(const PulseIslandList& pulseList,
00023                                      AnalysedPulseList& analysedList)
00024 {
00025   double amplitude, time;
00026   TAnalysedPulse* outPulse;
00027 
00028   // Get the various variables we need from TSetupData/SetupNavigator
00029   std::string bankname = pulseList[0]->GetBankName();
00030   fMaxBinAmplitude.pedestal = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(bankname);
00031 
00032   fMaxBinAmplitude.trigger_polarity = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname);
00033   fMaxBinTime.trigger_polarity = fMaxBinAmplitude.trigger_polarity;
00034 
00035   fMaxBinTime.clock_tick_in_ns = TSetupData::Instance()->GetClockTick(bankname);
00036   fMaxBinTime.time_shift = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTimeShift(bankname);
00037 
00038 
00039   for (PulseIslandList::const_iterator pulseIter = pulseList.begin(); pulseIter != pulseList.end(); pulseIter++) {
00040     amplitude = fMaxBinAmplitude(*pulseIter);
00041     time = fMaxBinTime(*pulseIter);
00042     
00043     // Make the TAnalysedPulse pulse
00044     outPulse=MakeNewTAP(pulseIter-pulseList.begin());
00045     outPulse->SetAmplitude(amplitude);
00046     outPulse->SetTime(time);
00047     //    outPulse->SetEnergy(energy); //AE (3rd Aug 2014): Commenting this out for the time being since we don't really know how we're doing calibration. The equation used before was:   energy = fECalibSlope * amplitude + fECalibOffset;
00048     // Add the pulse into the list
00049     analysedList.push_back(outPulse);
00050     
00051   }
00052   std::sort(analysedList.begin(), analysedList.end(), IsTimeOrdered);
00053   return 0;
00054 }
00055 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(MaxBin);
